sect2.title: Introduction to cURL
sect2.para: The cURL package contains curl and its support library. This is useful for transferring files with URL syntax. For example, curl http://curl.haxx.se/download/curl-&curl-version;.tar.gz > curl-&curl-version;.tar.gz would download this program's TAR ball to the current directory. This ability to both download and redirect files can be incorporated into other programs to support functions like streaming media.
